full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTZIS GZHUNG RIGS LDAN GNYIS PA'I ZHAL LUNG AA MRI tA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039B (ZHIS GZHUNG RIGS LDAN GNYIS PA'I ZHAL LUNG AA MRI tA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I DBANG CHEN YONGS RDZOGS LAN BZHI THOB CING STONG GZUGS PHYAG CHEN MI 'GYUR BDE CHEN ZUNG 'JUG GI NGO BO KHRI CHEN RIN PO CHES DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU TSOGS CHEN GRVA MANG LA tI KA CHEN DRI MED 'OD KYI LJAG LUNG GNANG SKABS NYAN PA'I SKAL BZANG THOB PA, BDE CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI MING 'DZIN PA, DGA' LDAN RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS, RGYUD DANG tI KA CHEN DE NYIS SNANG BA SOGS LA ZHIB TU DPYAD PA'I KHUL BYAS, GZHUNG RNYUNG RNAMS LA GZHI BYAS TE SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA SLOB DPON NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR GYIS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MAm GHA LA SHU WAm BA BHANTU SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
